## Client class

Main entity of the module.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default class Client
```

## Example

Getting all leagues' schedules.

```ts
import eSportsAPI from "@viriato/lol-esports-api";

const schedule = await eSportsAPI.leagues.getSchedule();
```
